Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

HeaterSummary.description: The heater metrics summary for the subsystem.
HeaterSummary.longDescription: This type shall contain properties that describe the heater metrics summary for the subsystem.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

TotalPrePowerOnHeatingTimeSeconds.description: The total number of seconds all the heaters in the thermal subsystem were active while the respective devices they heat were powered off.
TotalPrePowerOnHeatingTimeSeconds.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of seconds all the heaters in the thermal subsystem were active while the respective devices they heat were powered off.

TotalRuntimeHeatingTimeSeconds.description: The total number of seconds all the heaters in the thermal subsystem were active while the respective devices they heat were powered on.
TotalRuntimeHeatingTimeSeconds.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of seconds all the heaters in the thermal subsystem were active while the respective devices they heat were powered on.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ResetMetrics.description: This action resets the summary metrics related to this equipment.
ResetMetrics.longDescription: This action shall reset any time intervals or counted values for this equipment.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

TemperatureSummary.description: The temperature readings for a subsystem.
TemperatureSummary.longDescription: This type shall contain properties that describe temperature sensor for a subsystem.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Ambient.description: The ambient temperature (Celsius) of this subsystem.
Ambient.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius units, for the ambient temperature of this subsystem.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

Exhaust.description: The exhaust temperature (Celsius) of this subsystem.
Exhaust.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius units, for the exhaust temperature of this subsystem.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

Intake.description: The intake temperature (Celsius) of this subsystem.
Intake.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius units, for the intake temperature of this subsystem.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

Internal.description: The internal temperature (Celsius) of this subsystem.
Internal.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius units, for the internal temperature of this subsystem.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

ThermalMetrics.description: The ThermalMetrics schema represents the thermal metrics of a chassis.
ThermalMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall represent the thermal metrics of a chassis for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

HeaterSummary.description: The summary of heater metrics for this chassis.
HeaterSummary.longDescription: This property shall contain the summary of heater metrics for this subsystem.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

TemperatureReadingsCelsius.description: The temperatures (Celsius) from all related sensors for this device.
TemperatureReadingsCelsius.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperatures, in degrees Celsius units, for this subsystem.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

TemperatureSummaryCelsius.description: The summary temperature readings for this chassis.
TemperatureSummaryCelsius.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperature sensor readings for this subsystem.

title: #ThermalMetrics.v1_1_0.ThermalMetrics
